title: Laser Drill
summaries: The Laser Drill is a Hardmode, post-Golem drill that is dropped by most ground-based enemies during the Martian Madness event. It produces a drill beam that extends up to 16 tiles in length. It also boasts the highest pickaxe power of any pickaxe or drill in the entire game at 230%.
Its best modifier is Godly, as drills cannot receive any modifiers that affect speed, but the Laser Drill can still receive knockback boosts.

statistics.Sell: 10 GC
